#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

void FINDNCR( int m, int n, int k ) {
	
	vector< vector<int> > A( m + 1, vector<int> ( m + 1 ) );
	int i, j;
	
	if( ( m == 0 ) && ( n == 0 ) ) {
		printf("0\n");
		return;
	}
		
	for( i = 0;i <= m;i++ ) {

		A[ i ][ 0 ] = 1;
		A[ i ][ i ] = 1;
	}
	
	for( i = 2;i <= m;i++ )
		for( j = 1;j <= i;j++ )
			A[ i ][ j ] = ( A[ i - 1 ][ j - 1 ] + A[ i - 1 ][ j ] ) % k;	
	
	printf("%d\n", A[ m ][ n ] );
}

int main() {
	
	int t, m, n, k;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d %d %d",&m, &n, &k );
		FINDNCR( m + n, m, k );
	}
	
	return 0;
}
